alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central DeKalb, southeastern Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bolton, or near Atlanta, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Chamblee, Fair Oaks, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Vinings, Sweet Auburn, Piedmont Park, Cascade Heights, Brookhaven, Little Five Points and Atlantic Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
